title: `assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL` at /compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code ``` shell git clone https://github.com/little-dude/netlink.git git check out db36e94bff6646668e170162d8cfe4ddc0d4f446 cd netlink/netlink-packet-route cargo expand --manifest-path ./Cargo.toml rtnl::tc::buffer ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 59eed8a2aac0230a8b53e89d4e99d55912ba6b35 commit-date: 2021-11-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.56.1 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ``` $ cargo expand --version cargo-expand 1.0.15 ``` ### Error output ``` $ cargo expand --manifest-path ./Cargo.toml rtnl::tc::buffer Checking netlink-packet-utils v0.5.0 (/home/wanglei01/opt/open/rust/netlink/netlink/netlink-packet-utils) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (0b42deacc 2021-12-09) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
Backtrace
